reference.title: Components of a Smith Corona Holiday Case
reference.shortdesc: The Smith Corona Holiday Case is one of the most popular portable cases, accompanying most vintage portable Smith Corona typewriters. They have a few mechanisms that are useful to know.

dlentry.dd: The metal frame attached to the bottom of the Holiday Case that holds the typewriter in place.
Two triangular, pointed components at the end of the fastening frame that sit in the rear retainer slots.
A small, metal lever located at the bottom left hand side of the fastening frame.
Small, spring-loaded levers near each hinge that, when pressed, unhook the hinge components so that the case lid can be removed.
A small lever with a white arrow button, located on the left hand side of the bottom of the Holiday Case.
Two small, metal slots that are located on the back of the bottom half of the Holiday Case.
